channel.title: Futurescape allstar!
channel.description:
Hello!, this is Futurescape. A great 317 allstar server.
The server been up for almost 5 years. And we will always try to be unique.
Forums: http://fsforums.zapto.org/index/?act=idx
Highscores: http://fshighscores.zapto.org
Client download: http://uppit.com/84hqhz3tvl6l/Futurescape_Client_v2.8.zip
Webclient: http://fswebclient.zapto.org [b](^We recommend you to use the download client^)[/b]
What do we have to offer you:
-Voting for reward. (vote4fs.zapto.org) -All skill levels go to 175. -Custom Quick Chat. (click on a skill in the Stats tab) -Our own custom Lottery. -1b CW Tickets to hold money. -Bosses with our custom special attacks & text. -Vote Token shop via the Quest tab. -PK Points via the Quest tab. -Items on Death via the Quest tab. -Items kept on death checks your inventory & what you're wearing. -All skills are trainable, some are better for money than others. -View your miscellaneous character information. (::viewnfo) -Custom player titles that you can earn by doing various things in-game. -Dicing with Trusted Dicers. (they will have a dark glow around their character at the dicing area) -We are online 24/7 on a non-lagging network. -Our custom 'Rejuvenation' spell that heals a player to their maximum hitpoints level. -Our custom Soul Split prayer that can heal on players and NPC's. (Redemption prayer) -Full Slayer with tasks & Slayer points. (For resetting your task) -A Crystal Shield that halves incoming damage. -A Rockshell set effect that can hit a maximum of 255 on NPC's. -A nice Rares area with trolls which drop XP lamps and other good stuff. -Various Donator-only items (such as our Double XP ring). [b](Donate is temporary off)[/b] -Ability to choose between regular and x10 hits on our client. (5, 10 or 50, 100) -Friendly community. (over 16000 accounts made and counting) -Our client supports colored text for easy reading. -A delightful economy. (extremely different than any other) -A nice steady amount of players for our server type & revision. -Bank pins to keep your items safe. (click 'Use' on any bank) -An alch checker command to see what an item will alch for. (::alchvalue itemID, item ID's can be seen on our client when you right click on an item) -New players have 20 minutes of Double XP. -Many ways to play & enjoy. How you achieve your entertainment in-game is up to you!
What are you waiting for? We have many more features in-game, why not log in and see our full potential to make you stay and play? You know you want too.... :D
Some pictures:
Custom titles. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/6s3vh5.png[/img]
Jungle demon,solo boss. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2j1kiud.png[/img]
One of the dagganoth kings. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2nb6avl.png[/img]
On this picture you can see: -veng emote -dm area (funpk) -custom soulsplit( redemption) -anger weapons [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/347i8up.png[/img]
All pictures are made by the owner.

item.title: Futurescape allstar!
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Thanks for all the good feedback.
Owner will appreciate it.

We are now on a average online of 6-9, which is in school time.
Around dinner time, we reach 15+.

So we just need to find the allstar lovers and tell them about Futurescape.
And indeed, allstar servers are sadly enough something from the past.

Read full topic

item.title: Futurescape allstar!
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

rockh4rd:

i used to love allstar ill check this out

this server was pretty good back in the day, 40+ people on always I do believe. however, allstar is a thing of the past, sadly. now it’s all about the 700+ shit, even though it’s the same fucking thing as RuneScape, but they don’t give a fuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Futurescape allstar!
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Hello!, this is Futurescape.
A great 317 allstar server.

The server been up for almost 5 years.
And we will always try to be unique.

Forums:
http://fsforums.zapto.org/index/?act=idx

Highscores:
http://fshighscores.zapto.org

Client download:
http://uppit.com/84hqhz3tvl6l/Futurescape_Client_v2.8.zip

Webclient:
http://fswebclient.zapto.org (^We recommend you to use the download client^)

What do we have to offer you:

-Voting for reward. (vote4fs.zapto.org)
-All skill levels go to 175.
-Custom Quick Chat. (click on a skill in the Stats tab)
-Our own custom Lottery.
-1b CW Tickets to hold money.
-Bosses with our custom special attacks & text.
-Vote Token shop via the Quest tab.
-PK Points via the Quest tab.
-Items on Death via the Quest tab.
-Items kept on death checks your inventory & what you’re wearing.
-All skills are trainable, some are better for money than others.
-View your miscellaneous character information. (::viewnfo)
-Custom player titles that you can earn by doing various things in-game.
-Dicing with Trusted Dicers. (they will have a dark glow around their character at the dicing area)
-We are online 24/7 on a non-lagging network.
-Our custom ‘Rejuvenation’ spell that heals a player to their maximum hitpoints level.
-Our custom Soul Split prayer that can heal on players and NPC’s. (Redemption prayer)
-Full Slayer with tasks & Slayer points. (For resetting your task)
-A Crystal Shield that halves incoming damage.
-A Rockshell set effect that can hit a maximum of 255 on NPC’s.
-A nice Rares area with trolls which drop XP lamps and other good stuff.
-Various Donator-only items (such as our Double XP ring). (Donate is temporary off)
-Ability to choose between regular and x10 hits on our client. (5, 10 or 50, 100)
-Friendly community. (over 16000 accounts made and counting)
-Our client supports colored text for easy reading.
-A delightful economy. (extremely different than any other)
-A nice steady amount of players for our server type & revision.
-Bank pins to keep your items safe. (click ‘Use’ on any bank)
-An alch checker command to see what an item will alch for. (::alchvalue itemID, item ID’s can be seen on our client when you right click on an item)
-New players have 20 minutes of Double XP.
-Many ways to play & enjoy. How you achieve your entertainment in-game is up to you!

What are you waiting for? We have many more features in-game, why not log in and see our full potential to make you stay and play? You know you want too…

-veng emote

-anger weapons
